biography_text: ROONEY, Francis, a Representative from Florida; born in Tulsa, Tulsa County, Okla., December 4, 1953; graduated from Georgetown Preparatory School, North Bethesda, Md., 1971; A.B., Georgetown University, Washington, D.C., 1975; J.D., Georgetown University, Washington, D.C., 1978; business owner; United States Ambassador to the Holy See, 2005-2008; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Fifteenth Congress (January 3, 2017-present).
